description: The file 'code_generator.py' is a Python source script responsible for generating C++ header and source files for JSON-RPC API definitions based on a given schema. It includes functions for creating headers, generating classes, enums, version info, and stubs, and references various external modules and resources within the project.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file containing JSON-RPC API declarations based on provided headers list.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that processes a JSON schema to generate C++ code for JSON-RPC API, classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementations depending on options.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
